subject: About Struts Action Testing
msgSnippet: Hello I have read your currently subject about Web Unit testing. I don t know that is it possible to use these tools or some thing like them for testing Struts
messageBody:
Hello

I have read your currently subject about Web Unit
testing. I don't know that is it possible to use these
tools or some thing like them for testing Struts
Action classes?

Yours Faithfully
Soheil Dowlatshahi

Message: 1
Date: Fri, 26 Aug 2005 16:39:54 -0000
From: "YongHow" <yonghow_c@...>
Subject: Re: JWebUnit with Mockobject

> >
> > Just want to check if anyone know there is
mockobject that
> > can be used with JWebUnit to simulate the
webserver,
> > or it that possible at all ?
>
> HttpUnit (used by JWebUnit) provides two
alternatives, depending on
> what you are trying to do. If you are developing
servlets,
ServletUnit
> allows you to build them test first without a
servlet container. If
> you are focusing on web client development,
PseudoServer can simulate
> a webserver, returning predefined responses. The
unit tests included
> with HttpUnit demonstrate both.

Thanks Russell, thats what I need, I will give it a
try.
